fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Force someone to randomly discard 1 card immediately.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Choose a card type. Force someone to discard 2 cards immediately, prioritizing the type you chose. 

*This will take effect after a player has discarded down to their hand limit. If no cards of the chosen type are found, a random other card will instead be discarded.*
